mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(community_num, title, content, writer_id) VALUES(seq_COMMUNITY.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer_id})
mapper.select: select * FROM ( SELECT community_num, title, content, writer_id, regdate, viewcount, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY community_num DESC) AS RNUM FROM community ) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${pageStart} AND ${endPage}
SELECT COUNT(community_num) FROM community WHERE community_num > 0
mapper.update: update community set title= #{title},content=#{content} where community_num=#{community_num}
update community set viewcount = viewcount+1 where community_num=#{community_num}
